item.title: We March Backwards Into the Future
item.description: I am thinking of The Binding of Isaac, Y combinators, recursion, and Marshall MacLuhan. I had a long conversation about death with a good friend today over economy rice (I remember someone telling me that eating economy rice alone is the saddest thing in the world). Our conversation skirted the rims of the contingency of death, about how death doesn’t discriminate, and how the only thing that insulates you from death is either divine influence, or not caring.
